title: 求最新版SDK 木仓   木戒 模组

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
s Guns 1.6.6 v5.zip
(631.79 KB, 下载次数: 22)



2011-7-13 15:07 上传
点击文件名下载附件







Back up your saves and bin folders.
delete the META-INF folder in minecraft.jar (in %appdata%\.minecraft\bin)
Install ModLoader
Install ModLoaderMP
Copy everything inside the minecraft folder (in the zip file) into minecraft.jar (in %appdata%\.minecraft\bin)
Copy everything inside the resources folder (in the zip file) into the resources folder (in %appdata%\.minecraft)
Copy the mod_*.properties files (in the zip file) into the .minecraft folder (%appdata%\.minecraft)

唉, 一定又要人翻譯了... 
1. 備份你的存檔 saves 跟 bin 文件夾. 以防萬一
2. 刪除 minecraft.jar 中的 META-INF 文件夾
3. 安裝  ModLoader
4. 安裝 ModLoaderMP
5. 把MOD壓縮檔內的 minecraft 文件夾中所有東西丟進 minecraft.jar
6. 把MOD壓縮檔內的 resources 文件夾中所有東西丟進 resources 文件夾
7. 把MOD壓縮檔內的 mod_SdkGuns.properties 放到 .minecraft  文件夾

ModLoader , ModLoaderMP 安裝請參考教學帖 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html
